content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mister Wang, it's a pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you will find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in the apartment, and I'm looking to pay a fair price. Can you tell me what you're asking for the rent?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Of course, Mister Wang. I'm looking to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. What is your budget for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for the highest price, and I'm here to negotiate the best deal for both of us. Can you give me a starting price for the rent?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Certainly, Mister Wang. I'm looking to start at 800 Euro per month. Is that within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 800 Euro per month is quite high for an unfurnished apartment. Can we discuss a lower price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm willing to negotiate, but keep in mind that I'm looking to maximize my profit. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm prepared to offer 650 Euro per month, which I believe is a fair price considering the size and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 650 Euro per month is much lower than what I'm looking for. I'm willing to consider an offer closer to 750 Euro per month. Is that within your range?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 750 Euro per month is still quite high. I'm looking to keep the rent around 650 Euro per month. Can we meet in the middle? Perhaps at 675 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 675 Euro per month is still not enough for me. I'm willing to go down to 700 Euro per month as a compromise. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
